other_tests.findings: Clear CSF with 22 mononuclear cells/mL, protein level of 80 mg/dL, glucose level of 41 mg/dL, extraordinarily high level of HIV RNA (13,000,000 copies/mL).
other_tests.changes_over_time: CSF cell counts and biochemical test results were normal after 2 weeks of antiretroviral therapy; CSF HIV RNA level decreased to 73 copies/mL at 6 months of follow-up.
